actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection

official_title: To provide for grants to States for enacting statewide laws regulating public playgrounds consistent with playground safety guidelines established by the Consumer Product Safety Commission.

summary.text: Safe Playgrounds Act - Directs the Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) to provide grants to any State that has enacted a statewide law regulating public playgrounds consistent with guidelines in the CPSC Handbook for Public Playground Safety, or any other similar CPSC guidelines.

titles.title: To provide for grants to States for enacting statewide laws regulating public playgrounds consistent with playground safety guidelines established by the Consumer Product Safety Commission.
